title: IBM Cloud® Databases
introduction: The IBM Cloud® Databases portfolio contains database-as-a-service offerings on IBM Cloud®. In addition to the comprehensive information in the IBM Cloud® Databases documentation, links to additional sources of information are provided below.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloud® Databases for PostgreSQL
section_recommended.description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database that is highly customizable.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloud® Databases for MongoDB
section_recommended.description: MongoDB is a JSON document store with a rich query and aggregation framework.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloud® Databases for Redis
section_recommended.description: Redis is a blazingly fast, in-memory data structure store.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloud® Databases for Elasticsearch
section_recommended.description: Elasticsearch combines the power of a full text search engine with the indexing strengths of a JSON document database.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloud® Databases for MySQL
section_recommended.description: IBM Cloud® Databases for MySQL is a serverless, cloud database service that is fully integrated into the IBM Cloud environment.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloud® Messages for RabbitMQ
section_recommended.description: RabbitMQ is an open source multi-protocol messaging broker.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloud® Databases for EnterpriseDB
section_recommended.description: EnterpriseDB is a PostgreSQL-based database engine optimized for performance, developer productivity, and compatibility with Oracle.

section_recommended.title: IBM Cloud® Databases for etcd
section_recommended.description: etcd is a distributed, reliable key-value store for the most critical data of a distributed system.
